devdoc.details: The Governor holds the rights to stage and execute contract calls i.e. changing Livepeer protocol parameters.

cancel((address[],uint256[],bytes[],uint.details: Reverts if an update does not exist.Reverts if the 'msg.sender' is not the 'owner'

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

execute((address[],uint256[],bytes[],uin.details: Updates are authorized during staging.Reverts if a transaction can not be executed.

stage((address[],uint256[],bytes[],uint2.details: Reverts if the 'msg.sender' is not the 'owner'Reverts if an update is already staged

params._delay: (uint256) Delay (in number of blocks) for the update.

transferOwnership(address).details: Can only be called through stage/execute, will revert if the caller is not this contract's address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Governor

stage((address[],uint256[],bytes[],uint2.notice: Stage a batch of updates to be executed.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
